DOC.HEADLINE: LEAD-BASED PAINT BROCHURE OFFERED
DOC.TEXT: " Dealing With Lead-Based Paint : A Practical Guide for Consumers , " a brochure outlining a step-by-step approach to managing lead paint and the hazards that can be encountered in abatement , has been prepared by the National Paint & Coatings Assn . A copy of the brochure may be obtained by sending a stamped self-addressed envelope to Lead Brochure , Paint and Coatings Industry Information Center , 1500 Rhode Island Ave. , N.W. , Washington D.C. 20005 .
